description:
Takayuki has been picked to lead the project to promote a movie adaptation of a novel. In order to prepare for the meeting, he devours all the other works of the author, who curiously has the same name as a childhood friend of his, Igarashi Motoharu. On the day of the meeting, Takayuki`s completely in awe because Motoharu keeps correctly guessing facts from his  childhood...
Source: crunchyroll
